headline: Thai Sticky Black Rice Pudding
name: Thai Sticky Black Rice Pudding
description: Black rice is simmered with water, sugar, and coconut milk to make this sticky Thai pudding, a lovely Asian dessert.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine water, black rice, and salt in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and cover; simmer for 40 minutes.
Add coconut milk and sugar. Bring back to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, until rice reaches a sticky consistency, about 30 minutes.
Remove from heat and allow mixture to cool. Stir and serve.
